title: Ensnared
content:

The creature or an ally can use its action to tear away the vines.

Ensnared is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Ensnared Information

Effect: Ensnared creatures take 1d6 Piercing damage at the start of each turn. The creature or an ally can use its action to tear away the vines.

How to Acquire Ensnared

Can be applied by Ensnaring Str
